name: Treat and Escape (Quest)
description:
Escape the room, but this time you will have to solve puzzles for a scarecrow to find his treats, then he will reward you with the tools you need to escape (or maybe the tools you need to collect more treats for him!)

Controls:

Press Right Joystick - Teleport

Move Left Joystick - Rotate player in place, or rotate teleportation

Grip - Grab/Interact with Items
